title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 §§ 8186-26.13 - Completion of survey
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 §§ 8186-26.13 - Completion of survey

State Regulations

The results of the survey shall become a public record and
be subject to the provisions of article 6 of the Public Officers Law upon
completion of the survey. The survey shall be considered complete for a
municipality upon the first use of the survey results in the determination of a
tentative State equalization rate pursuant to Subpart 8186-2 of this Part, tentative special equalization ratios pursuant to former 9 NYCRR Subpart
186-7, as repealed in 1998, tentative class ratios pursuant to former 9 NYCRR Subpart
186-8, as repealed in 1997, or tentative class equalization rates pursuant to
former 9 NYCRR Subpart
186-11, as repealed in 1997 for that
municipality. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20
§§
8186-26.13

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
